pr_title: add: spring keyvault sample starter add authority-host param

timeline.message: add: spring keyvault sample starter add authority-host param

timeline.bodyText:
Is this the default value for authority host?
new IdentityClientOptions().getAuthorityHost()
timeline.author: saragluna

replies.bodyText: yes,the constructor of IdentityClientOptions will initialize authorityHost  with default value
replies.author: backwind1233

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need this value here?
timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,6 +81,7 @@ public void addKeyVaultPropertySource(String normalizedName) {
         final SecretClient secretClient = new SecretClientBuilder()
                 .vaultUrl(vaultUri)
                 .credential(tokenCredential)
+                .serviceVersion(SecretServiceVersion.V7_0)

replies.bodyText:
by default, serviceVersion value is V7_1, but the starter run failed with errors below
{"error":{"code":"BadParameter","message":"The specified version (7.1) is not recognized. Consider using the latest supported version (2016-10-01)."}}
replies.author: backwind1233

timeline.bodyText: we need to specify the package
timeline.author: zhoufenqin
